title: Say It Loud (The Black History Month Episode) With Chico Bean | Ep. 8
itunes:title: Say It Loud (The Black History Month Episode) With Chico Bean | Ep. 8
description:
The guys are still out on the west coast filming for Wild N' Out. With the help of return guest Chico Bean, the crew runs through Black History facts, touch on #OscarsSoWhite and Karlous & Chico still try to get to the truth on who stole who's rhymes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
